title: Architecture Documentation
desc: Plan and document all details of the application and data structure and request flows and repsonses.

title: Set Up Server Environment
desc: Provision hardware, virtual instances, app certificates, and permissions for servers.

title: Set-up React App
desc: Install correct version of Node, npm, and React. Test boilerplate with examples. Begin building routes and components.

title: Design Logo
desc: Layout logo in Adobe Illustrator, use Adobe Photoshop or Affinity Photo to generate semi transparent PNG instance of the logo for various use cases such as Web and Retina displays.

title: Design Workflow
desc: Generate personas, user stories, and design workflows based on research for an efficient customer experience. Design is how it works.

title: Create Site Mockup
desc: Make a pixel perfect layout in Sketch, Figma, or Photoshop to show what we will build including some important states and views.

title: Build DB
desc: Set up secured instance of Mongo DB, MySQL, PostGRESQL, or Oracle. Facilitate secure socket communication for queries and also encrypted storage of data.

title: Write Test Data
desc: Set up React testing framework and begin to write basic assertions of expected behaviors.

title: Fix Homepage Error
desc: There is an error reported on the homepage on load. Perhaps a missing dependency. Please verify and fix.

title: Code React Components
desc: Write react components needed to meet requirements and plan for state sharing and paramter drilling we expect.

title: Write Tests
desc: Write test coverage for all components!

title: Migrate DB
desc: Normalize and import DATA from satellite team.

title: Add a Datepicker to Cards
desc: Allow entry of Date within Kanban Card details.

title: Fix Issue with Update Api
desc: Update needs graceful error handling and guidance to user.

title: Develop Calendar
desc: Write calendar view to show cards by date.

title: Update Tests
desc: Make relevant changes to tests to comply with new framework updates!
